subject: ORDER #SSN4819
description_text:
Hello,

I made this order with the baseplate for just realised that I think it’s
too wide for my Playseat trophy.

Can you please remove the baseplate from the order?

Thanks

conversations.body_text:
Hello,

As well as removing the baseplate, can I also add a set of white elastomers.

Thanks.

On Sun, 14 Dec 2025 at 11:16, service@simsonn.com
Hi sam levy,    Okay, I've modified your order.

Hello,

Thank you!

What was the difference in price?

Thanks!

On Mon, 15 Dec 2025 at 09:47, service@simsonn.com
Hi sam levy,    We'll refund the difference for you, so don't worry.

Hello,

Have these been shipped yet?

On the tracking I just see label received but no tracking information.

Thanks.

On Mon, 15 Dec 2025 at 12:53, service@simsonn.com

Hi sam levy,    We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused. Our warehouse has been exceptionally busy recently, resulting in some errors. We discovered that the DHL package shipped to you yesterday contained only the pedals without the base plate.   https://www.dhl.de/en/privatkunden/pakete-empfangen/verfolgen.html?piececode=CE326637380DE  We will reship the base plate and haptics from our German warehouse.   And this tracking number will be sent for your white elastomer and U-shaped bracket.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=YT2534900709306197

Hello,

I don’t want the base plate, it should have been cancelled from the order
and refunded.

No problems on the haptics, looking forward to receiving them!

On Wed, 24 Dec 2025 at 09:32, service@simsonn.com
Hi sam levy,    Alright, thank you for your confirmation.

Thank you!

Merry Christmas ?

On Wed, 24 Dec 2025 at 10:23, service@simsonn.com

Hello,

I have not received the refund for my the pedal plate.

Also do you know when the adapters for the haptics and the elastomers are
arriving?

Thanks.

On Wed, 24 Dec 2025 at 10:24, service@simsonn.com
